Change summary:

---


## Type of change

- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation Update
- [ ] This change has an associated back-end Pull Request

---

> NOTE: Do not merge front-end changes until back-end PR is complete. Always merge back-end changes
> before the front-end changes.

## Checklist:

- [ ] My code and this PR follow the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have attached relevant screenshots related to the changes.
- [ ] I have updated the associated Jira ticket to `Code Review` status.
